# placeholderString

**Instance Property**

The string the text field displays when empty to help the user understand the text field’s purpose.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var placeholderString: String? { get set }
```

## Setting Placeholder Text

- **placeholderAttributedString**: The attributed string the text field displays when empty to help the user understand the text field’s purpose.
